programme.title: James Baker and Russians in Iraq
programme.short_synopsis: Secretary James Baker before the Senate, and Russian advisors to Saddam Hussein.
programme.medium_synopsis: Secretary James Baker's questioning by the Senate foreign relations committee on Iraq; the presence of Russian military advisors working with Saddam Hussein on advanced weapons.
